com.cognifide.qa.bb.config

Interface ConfigStrategy

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    LegacyConfig, YamlConfig

    public interface ConfigStrategy
    Classes implementing this interfaces determine how Bobcat configuration is being loaded.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default Properties gatherProperties()
      Determines how all properties are being processed.
      Properties loadConfig()
      Determines how the Bobcat user configuration is loaded.
      Properties loadDefaultConfig()
      Determines how the default configuration included in Bobcat is loaded.
      default Properties overrideFromSystemProperties(Properties properties)
      Determines how the loaded configuration is overriden with system properties, e.g.
      default void setSystemProperties(Properties properties)
      Sets system properties for loaded properties that start with .

    • Method Detail

      • gatherProperties

        default Properties gatherProperties()
        Determines how all properties are being processed.

        The default implementation uses the following order:

        1. Load the default configuration included by Bobcat itself (via loadDefaultConfig() method)
        2. Load the config from Bobcat user files (via loadConfig() method); override any previous properties
        3. Override the loaded properties from system properties provided from command line
        4. Set system properties with loaded properties that start with
        Returns:
        all loaded and processed Properties

      • loadDefaultConfig

        Properties loadDefaultConfig()
        Determines how the default configuration included in Bobcat is loaded.
        Returns:
        the default set of Bobcat Properties

      • loadConfig

        Properties loadConfig()
        Determines how the Bobcat user configuration is loaded.
        Returns:
        the user set of Bobcat Properties

      • overrideFromSystemProperties

        default Properties overrideFromSystemProperties(Properties properties)
        Determines how the loaded configuration is overriden with system properties, e.g. parameteres provided via command-line.
        Parameters:
        properties - the Properties containing the default and user configuration
        Returns:
        Properties with overrides from system properties

      • setSystemProperties

        default void setSystemProperties(Properties properties)
        Sets system properties for loaded properties that start with .
        Parameters:
        properties - loaded config
